name: Hot Airship Ballooning
description:
This game has you take control of an Airship controlled by two hot air balloons. You have to manage their temperatures wisely to generate lift and tilt for momentum!

While you are exploring, take time to plunder the gold you find on the Islands!

You may notice all the islands have frozen over! This should prove no match for your flame gun! Oh, by the way, you have a flame gun... and a grappling hook. Your average pirate Captian.

I wonder why all these islands are frozen over in the Caribbean? Maybe it has something to due with the Sun God leaving the sky and coming to earth to find whoever stole their flame gun.

Sucks to be that fellow.

-------Controls ------------

A/D: move left right

Space : Jump

Left Click: Shoot fire gun

Right Click: Grapling hook
